steps.name: Step 1: Log in as customer
steps.description: Log in to the application using valid credentials
steps.action: Open the login page and enter valid username and password

steps.name: Step 2: Navigate to invoice page
steps.description: Navigate to the invoice page after logging in

steps.name: Step 3: Print invoice
steps.description: Print the invoice by clicking on the 'Print Invoice' button

gherkin.given: Login as customer with valid username and password

steps.name: Step 1: Log in as customer with invalid username and password
steps.description: Log in to the application using invalid credentials
steps.action: Open the login page and enter invalid username and password

steps.name: Step 2: Navigate to invoice page
steps.description: Navigate to the invoice page after logging in

steps.name: Step 3: Print invoice
steps.description: Print the invoice by clicking on the 'Print Invoice' button

gherkin.given: Login as customer with invalid username and password

steps.name: Step 1: Log in as customer with empty username and password
steps.description: Log in to the application using empty credentials
steps.action: Open the login page and enter empty username and password

steps.name: Step 2: Navigate to invoice page
steps.description: Navigate to the invoice page after logging in

steps.name: Step 3: Print invoice
steps.description: Print the invoice by clicking on the 'Print Invoice' button

gherkin.given: Login as customer with empty username and password
